description:
Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!
Kaido hilare. Les Empereurs contre la relève !
Kaidos Gelächter! – Die Kaiser der Meere gegen die neue Generation!
Warau Kaidou! Yonkou vs Shin Sedai!
Смех Кайдо! Императоры против нового поколения!
كايدو يضحك! اليونكو ضدّ الجيل الأسوأ!
笑うカイドウ! 四皇VS新世代!
